subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In an ongoing war of words, Dwyane Wade took a shot recently at Dirk Nowitzki’s leadership in clutch situations. Dallas owner Mark Cuban responded, questioning Wade’s ability to judge a leader.
snippet: In an ongoing war of words, Dwyane Wade took a shot recently at Dirk Nowitzki’s leadership in clutch situations. Dallas owner Mark Cuban responded, questioning Wade’s ability to judge a leader.
